name: NS-Gym
desc: One of the developers and maintainers of **NS-Gym**, a comprehensive, open-source simulation framework for non-stationary Markov decision processes. We got our paper on NS-Gym accepted at **NeurIPS 2025**!

name: CPS PI Meeting 2025: NS-Gym Tutorial
desc: Co-presented a tutorial at the 2025 NSF Cyber-Physical Systems Principal Investigators' Meeting titled 'Decision-Making under Non-Stationarity: Concepts, Trends, and Challenges.'

name: Workshop Tutorial @ ICAA 2024
desc: Gave my **first** tutorial on NS-Gym at the workshop 'Recent Trends in Sequential Decision-Making' during the 2024 **International Conference on Assured Autonomy (ICAA)**.
